item.title: Endless Archive & Update 40 Now Live on All Platforms
item.description: Discover the Update 40 base-game patch, featuring the unending battle of the Endless Archive and more, now live on all platforms!
item.content:encoded:
Discover the Update 40 base-game patch, featuring the unending battle of the Endless Archive and more, now live on all platforms!

The Elder Scrolls Online: Endless Archive and Update 40 are now live on PC/Mac, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, and PlayStation 5.

This base-game patch introduces an all-new PvE activity for Tamriel's adventurers and a host of new features and quality-of-life improvements—completely free for all ESO players! This update also fully localizes the game for Japanese players on Xbox and PlayStation consoles. This includes localization for the base game, all previous DLCs and Chapters, The Elder Scrolls Online: Necrom, and this most recent patch.

Endless Archive

In the Endless Archive, you can discover an unending challenge as you battle your way through the shifting libraries and twisting pathways of one of Hermaeus Mora's most mysterious strongholds.

A malignant force is causing chaos within the once solemn archive, and its custodian, Master Malkhest, needs brave explorers to investigate and fight back against the corruption.

Battle through the Archive

Unending Challenge

In this all-new PvE activity, you can team up with a trusted ally or go it solo as you contend with randomly generated stages filled with waves of monsters and perilous boss encounters.

The further you progress into this eternal arena, the more dangerous and numerous your foes become. Fall to the Archive's dangers three times, and your run ends, plus you have to start over. But don't let that phase you, as there's always another expedition into the Endless Archive waiting, and the greater the dangers, the greater the rewards are in turn!

Survive twisted maligraphies

Helping you survive these encounters are two types of boons you can choose along the way: Verses (temporary buffs that last until the end of the next Stage), and Visions (more permanent buffs that last your entire run). The Verses and Visions you choose can have a major impact on your run, so choose wisely!

Infinite Rewards

As you continue your expedition into the Endless Archive, you can discover and unlock a host of specials rewards, including unique collectibles, item sets, and more—all granted by the Prince of Knowledge himself!

These rewards include class set items, the first of their kind, which provide powerful boons to select Class Skill Lines.

Empower class skills with new item sets

However, that's not all. As you complete expeditions, you also earn a new currency called Archival Fortunes. With Archival Fortunes, you can purchase all manner of helpful items from the vendors within the Endless Archive's central hub. This includes one-time use buffs, individual item set items, fragments of collectibles, and even permanent account unlocks that provide boons for future runs!

Endless Archive collectible rewards

Finally, the Endless Archive also features a host of unique in-game collectibles that you can't earn anywhere else in Tamriel or Oblivion, including the Maligraphic Mount, Maligraphic Skeever pet, a unique Tales of Tribute deck, and much more. Check out our preview for more information on the Endless Archive's rewards.

Getting Started

The Endless Archive is a free base-game addition to The Elder Scrolls Online and is part of the Update 40 patch. There is no additional purchase necessary, although ESO Plus members will enjoy a bonus to Archival Fortune gains during their expeditions.

You can access the Endless Archive via two methods:

  • If you own the Necrom Chapter, you can find the entrance to the Endless Archive northeast of Cipher's Midden in Apocrypha.
  • If you don't own the Chapter, select the Endless Archive icon on your map of Apocrypha to teleport directly there.

Prepare for adventure

Brave adventurers may wish to dive right in to the archive's myriad mazelike passages, but you may wish to review these developer tips before you begin your expedition. Preparation is key—good luck!

Update 40

In addition to the new PvE activity, Update 40 also includes a host of new features and quality-of-life improvements that all of Tamriel's adventurers can enjoy.

Japanese Console Text Localization

Update 40 is fully localized for Japanese players on both Xbox and PlayStation consoles. These new translations have been added for both past and all future releases, including the base game, previous DLCs and Chapters, and the most-recent Necrom Chapter. To enable Japanese localization for your console, download the Update 40 patch and check your console's language settings.

Group Finder

The new Group Finder tool makes it easier than ever to find likeminded players to join you for practically any in-game activity, including typical group challenges such as Trials or Dungeon runs, but also more social activities such as zone explorations, roleplay sessions, or fashion contests!

Group Finder UI

There are a host of categories you can choose from when finding a group, but the Custom category allows you to create or find fellow players for any unique activity you can dream up!

In addition, the Group Finder allows you to set up requirements for your groups, including roles, CP levels, voice chat, and many more.

Grand Master Crafting Stations

Update 40 also introduces a new type of end-game furnishing for Tamriel's master crafters: Grand Master Crafting Stations. These special items allow you to consolidate your home's (likely many) attuned crafting stations into one, severely reducing the amount of housing slots your crafting stations take up AND freeing up space in general. The more attuned crafting stations you “feed” to your Grand Master station, the more visually distinct that specific furnishing will appear as it evolves over time.

Grand Master Crafting Stations

You can acquire Grand Master Crafting Stations using Writ Vouchers from the Achievement Mediator, Faustina Curio, with a unique furnishing available for each of Blacksmithing, Jewelry Crafting, Clothing, and Woodworking.

You can dive deeper into both the Group Finder and Grand Master Crafting Stations in this preview blog.

Jewelry Crafting Rebalance

This patch also establishes a broad rebalancing of Jewelry Crafting to help align its costs with the game's other crafting disciplines. This includes the removal of Jewelry Crafting grains and conversion into platings in addition to increasing the total boosters needed to upgrade your jewelry. As a result, upgrading rings and amulets is now easier and cheaper than ever before.

Quest XP & Gold Standardization

Finally, Update 40 also standardizes the Experience Point and Gold rewards for many of the game's quests, including those associated with zones, main storylines, prologues, dailies, guild storylines, and more. This will result in more consistent rewards for the game's various quests based on their complexity or length.

Of course, these are just some of the changes implemented with the base-game patch. Be sure to visit our Patch Notes forum to review everything coming with this massive update.

Endless Challenges

In the Update 40 base-game patch, you can discover an all-new challenge for you and your fiercest allies as you delve ever-deeper into the dynamic galleries of a corrupted library. How far will your expedition into the Endless Archive get? The only limits are your preparation and skills! Tell us if you'll be venturing into the free Endless Archive PvE activity via X (formerly Twitter), Instagram, or Facebook—good luck!

The Update 40 base-game patch and Endless Archive are now live on PC/Mac, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, and PlayStation 5.

item.title: Defend Tamriel from Destruction during the Gates of Oblivion Celebration Event
item.description: Defeat the agents of Mehrunes Dagon and earn bonus rewards during this new in-game event!
item.content:encoded:
Defeat the agents of Mehrunes Dagon and earn bonus rewards during this new in-game event!

Unravel Dagon's Schemes

The Gates of Oblivion Celebration begins Thursday, November 16 at 10AM EST, and runs until Tuesday, November 28 at 10AM EST. During the festivities, players will enjoy an assortment of goodies including special Reward Boxes, Event Tickets, and increased drops to Daily Quests, Dungeons, Resource Nodes, as well as World Bosses and Delves throughout the Blackwood and the Deadlands zones.

To participate, you'll need access to Blackwood, Flames of Ambition, Waking Flame, or Deadlands, all of which are obtainable through ESO Plus™ or available for purchase from the in-game Crown Store.

Find Plokun in Gideon to begin!

You can then kick things off by picking up the introductory quest “Burdensome Beasts,” available for free within the in-game Crown Store or from Plokun, a Dremora found northwest of Gideon in the Blackwood zone.

Amass Incredible Rewards

Throughout the event, you can earn a Glorious Reward Box once per day each time you complete your first Daily Quest in either the Blackwood or Deadlands zones, or from the first Rockgrove Weekly Quest completed. You can also obtain a second Glorious Reward Box once per day by looting the final boss of any Flames of Ambition and Waking Flame dungeons.

Glorious Reward Boxes may contain the following items:

  • Random crafting materials
  • A Fine or Superior rarity sellable treasure
  • One of the following Blackwood/Deadlands motif style items:
    • If the reward box was obtained in the Overland:
      • Sul-Xan
      • Black Fin
      • Ivory Brigade
      • House Hexos
      • Fargrave Guardian
      • Annihilarch's Chosen
    • If the reward box was obtained in a Dungeon:
      • True-Sworn
      • Waking Flame
      • Knights of the Silver Rose
      • Crimson Oath
  • A Fine, Superior, or Epic rarity Blackwood or Deadlands overland set item
    • A Dungeon set item will be given instead if you obtained the Reward Box in a Dungeon
  • Companion Gear
  • One of the following drops
    • Blackwood or Deadlands furnishing recipes
    • Blackwood or Deadlands Treasure Maps or Survey Reports
    • Motif Chapters
      • If the reward box was obtained in the Overland:
        • Sul-Xan
        • Black Fin
        • Ivory Brigade
        • House Hexos
        • Fargrave Guardian
        • Annihilarch's Chosen
      • If the reward box was obtained in a Dungeon:
        • True-Sworn
        • Waking Flame
        • Knights of the Silver Rose
        • Crimson Oath
  • A chance for a style page for the NEW Y'ffre's Fallen-Wood armor

The new Y'ffre's Fallen-Wood armor style

In addition, you can collect the more common Regular Reward Boxes by participating in the following activities:

  • Slaying Delve and World Bosses in the Blackwood and Deadland zones
  • Defeating Flames of Ambition and Waking Flame dungeon bosses
  • Opening treasure chests
  • Opening safeboxes
  • Looting objects such as barrels, crates, etc.
  • Looting Psijic portals
  • Cracking open Thieves Troves
  • Harvesting crafting resource nodes

These reward boxes may contain the following items:

  • Random crafting materials
  • A chance for a Fine or Superior rarity sellable treasure
  • A chance for one of the following Blackwood/Deadlands motif style items:
    • Sul-Xan
    • Black Fin
    • Ivory Brigade
    • House Hexos
    • Fargrave Guardian
    • Annihilarch's Chosen
  • A Fine, Superior, or Epic rarity Blackwood or Deadlands Overland set item
    • A Dungeon set item will be given instead if you obtained the reward box in a Dungeon
  • A chance for Companion gear
  • A chance for one of the following drops
    • Blackwood or Deadlands furnishing recipes
    • Blackwood or Deadlands Treasure Maps or Survey Reports
    • Motif Chapters
      • Sul-Xan
      • Black Fin
      • Ivory Brigade
      • House Hexos
      • Fargrave Guardian
      • Annihilarch's Chosen
  • A small chance for a style page for the NEW Y'ffre's Fallen-Wood armor

Complete daily quests to earn bonus rewards

Impresario & Event Tickets

But that's not all! Throughout the duration of the celebration, players will receive two Event Tickets for the first of the following activities completed each day:

  • First Daily Quest completed in the Blackwood zone
  • First Daily Quest completed in the Deadlands zone
  • Weekly trial quest completed in Rockgrove
  • Slaying and looting the final boss in either Flames of Ambition or Waking Flame dungeons

In total, you can amass a whopping 26 Event Tickets during this event! Don't forget that you can carry only 12 Tickets at one time.

Here's what the Impresario has in stock:

  • All three Passion Dancer Blossom pet fragments
    • Chartreuse Lily Petals
    • Enchanted Silver Flute
    • Mystical Sheet Music
  • The first and second Hoardhunter Ursauk mount fragment
    • Blessed Honeycomb
    • NEW Gilded and Dyed Saddle
  • Bound style pages for the following:
    • NEW Y'ffre's Fallen-Wood
  • Impresario Group Repair Kits
  • Companion Guild Commendations

The Gates of Oblivion Celebration is your first chance to purchase the Gilded and Dyed Saddle, the second of three morphing fragments for the Hoardhunter Ursauk mount!

The Hoardhunter Ursauk mount

Learn more about morphing collectibles and upgrade fragments by checking out this guide. Be sure to keep your eyes peeled for the reveal of the final morphing fragment later this year!

Additionally, the Impresario's Assistant, Philius Dormier, is offering these valuable treasures in exchange for your hard-earned tickets:

  • Unstable Morpholith Fragments
  • Dagonic Quasigriff Fragments

Finally, Nenulaure the Indrik Vendor is stocking her shop with the following goodies:

  • Nascent Indrik Feathers
  • Crimson Indrik Berries
  • Pure-Snow Indrik Berries
  • Frost-Light Indrik Pet
  • Rosethorn Indrik Pet

Ward Off Destruction

Dismantle Daedric schemes while enjoying an assortment of tantalizing rewards and useful bonuses as you explore Blackwood and the Deadlands during the Gates of Oblivion Celebration. Are you prepared to free these lands from the corrupting influence of Mehrunes Dagon? Let us know via X (Formerly Twitter), Instagram, or Facebook!

The Gates of Oblivion Celebration in-game event begins next Thursday, November 16 at 10AM EST, and continues until Tuesday, November 28 at 10AM EST.

item.title: Crown Store Showcase—November 2023
item.description: Traverse the Endless Archive in style with November's new and exciting Crown Store offerings.
item.content:encoded:
Traverse the Endless Archive in style with November's new and exciting Crown Store offerings.

You can review all the new and returning items arriving to the Crown Store in November 2023 below. Remember: you can see absolutely everything available in the Crown Store right now by heading over to the Crown Store page. Additionally, be sure to stop by the Buy Crowns page to pick up whatever number of crowns you may need! Certain items and offers will be time-limited throughout the month, so be sure to read their individual details and don't miss out.


ESO Plus Deals

All ESO Plus™ members have access to a monthly selection of exclusive deals and items. You can find more information about them in this article.

Exclusive Free Items

Painting: Sanity's Edge

"As you can see by my attached references, I am one of the foremost experts in vicinage wards, forfending spells, and the art of research. If anyone can deal with the Dreamstone's ire, it is me. I hope you come to the same conclusion."—Warlock Vanton

The Painting: Sanity's Edge will be available in the Crown Store FREE exclusively to ESO Plus Members on all platforms for a limited time, from October 12 at 10AM EDT to November 22, 2023, at 10AM EST.


Painting: The Endless Library

A painting depicting just one of the innumerable studies within the Endless Library of Hermaeus Mora.

The Painting: The Endless Library will be available in the Crown Store FREE exclusively to ESO Plus Members on all platforms for a limited time, from November 22, 2023, to January 4, 2024, at 10AM EST.


Crown Gem and Seals of Endeavor Items

Mounts

Dragonscale Draugr Bear

Riders of these draugr bears find the dragonscale barding does an exemplary job. There's exactly as much jouncing as you'd expect riding hard on a skeletal ursine's back. Plus, the frost magic imbued within adds a frisson of chill to keep riders alert.

The Dragonscale Draugr Bear will be available for Crown Gems and Seals of Endeavor on all platforms for a limited time, from November 9 to November 16, 2023, at 10AM EST.


Adornments

Hair

Short Mussed Wave

With a head of hair this awesome, who needs braids, beads, or wraps? Those curls are strictly au naturel.

The Short Mussed Wave will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from November 20 to November 27, 2023, at 10AM EST. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.


Hat

Xanmeer Doyen's Feather Tiara

This gorgeous tiara is replicated from the intricate regalia of the Xanmeer Priesthoods. Wow the crowd and stand out with this beautiful plumage waving above your brow.

The Xanmeer Doyen's Feather Tiara will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from November 20 to November 27, 2023, at 10AM EST. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.


Skins

Azure Imp Epidermis

"Some, shall we say, ambitious sorts came up with a way to look a bit like those azure imps you sometimes see flitting about. No, you don't gain wings, but you'll very likely frighten most people out of their wits regardless."—Divayth Fyr

The Azure Imp Epidermis will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from November 2, 2023, at 10AM EDT to November 9, 2023, at 10AM EST. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.


Crafting

Motifs

Crown Crafting Motif: Sea Giant

Though not much is known of the Sea Giants, as Varcent Eardrey writes, their distinctive armor lends itself well to the fierce foes they hunt. Use to learn the Sea Giant crafting style. Also has a chance to drop by completing "The Fight For Kyne's Aegis" quest.

The Crown Crafting Motif: Sea Giant will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms starting November 13 to November 20, 2023, at 10AM EST. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item. Sea Giant Motif chapters, and very rarely the complete book, have a chance to drop from Kyne's Coffers, awarded from Thane Ogvar in the Kyne's Aegis trial from completing the weekly quest “The Fight for Kyne's Aegis”.


Outfit Styles

Elder Scrolls Artifact: Fearstruck

Alter your shield's Outfit style with a replica of the Fearstruck Elder Scrolls Artifact, a shield crafted by the Daedric Prince Boethiah.

The Elder Scrolls Artifact: Fearstruck will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms starting November 2, 2023, at 10AM EDT to November 6, 2023, at 10PM EST. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.


Maarselok Arms Pack

Summon your most stalwart companions to face the Dragon Maarselok in his lair and prevent him from corrupting the Changeling Selene. Then, perhaps, celebrate your victory by altering your weapon's appearance to match the Undaunted Maarselok awards by using this complete set of Outfit styles.

The Maarselok Arms Pack will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms starting November 2, 2023, at 10AM EDT to November 9, 2023, at 10AM EST. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item. The matching mask page will have a small chance to drop from Maarselok from veteran Lair of Maarselok. The matching shoulder page can be purchased from Urgarlag Chief-bane for 50 undaunted keys, or has a chance of dropping from Urgarlag's Mystery Coffer for 1 key. Having the achievement “Selene's Favor” increases the drop chance of both items.


Anvil of Zenithar Arms Pack

The Divine known as Zenithar may not have crafted these glowing weapons himself, but those who did claim the God of Work and Commerce inspired their work! Alter your weapon's appearance by using this complete set of Anvil of Zenithar Outfit styles.

The Anvil of Zenithar Arms Pack will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms starting November 9 to November 22, 2023, at 10AM EST.


Elder Scrolls Artifact: Mehrunes' Razor

Alter your one-handed dagger's Outfit style with a replica of the Mehrunes' Razor Elder Scrolls Artifact, the signature weapon of Daedric Prince Mehrunes Dagon.

The Elder Scrolls Artifact: Mehrunes' Razor will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms starting November 16 to November 22, 2023, at 10AM EST. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.


Prior Thierric Arms Pack

Prior Thierrec Sarazen, the knight-commander of the Knights of the Silver Rose, awaits those who brave Red Petal Bastion. Dare you and your fellow Undaunted adventurers face him? Alter your weapon's appearance to match the Undaunted Prior Thierric awards by using this complete set of Outfit styles.

The Prior Thierric Arms Pack will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms starting November 22 to November 30, 2023, at 10AM EST. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item. The matching mask page will have a small chance to drop from Prior Thierric Sarazen from veteran Red Petal Bastion. The matching shoulder page can be purchased from Urgarlag Chief-bane for 50 Undaunted keys, or has a chance of dropping from Urgarlag's Mystery Coffer for 1 key. Having the achievement “Prior Offenses” increases the drop chance of both items.


Wardrobe

Costumes

Pact Mother Elite Ensemble

"Today I don new robes, a symbol of my vow, my office. Blessed by Almalexia, may the Mother of Morrowind guide my hand. May she lend strength to me in times of conflict. For the Pact!"—Excerpt from Urona Hlaalu's Journal

The Pact Mother Elite Ensemble will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from November 2, 2023, at 10AM EDT, to November 9, 2023, at 10AM EST.


Graht-Climber's Active Wear

Stitchmaster Moneriel says, "We all have days when we have to climb the graht-oak to clean the house-pod gutters. Does that mean you have to dress like a frump? Of course not! Look trim and stylish in my latest halter-and-skirt outfit from Elden Root!"

The Graht-Climber's Active Wear will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from November 6 to November 9, 2023, at 10AM EST. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.


Traveling Merchant

Merchants need to look presentable, and those who travel require protection from the elements. With this outfit, you can travel through Tamriel and beyond knowing that you have met both requirements!

The Traveling Merchant costume will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from November 6 to November 9, 2023, at 10AM EST. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.


Solitude Stevedore's Jerkin

"The Nord stevedores who work the docks below the great stone arch of Solitude have a style all their own," says Jork the Tailor-Thane of Windhelm. "They take what they like from travelers of Tamriel and make it their own. Now you can, too!"

The Solitude Stevedore's Jerkin costume will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from November 9 to November 13, 2023, at 10AM EST. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.


Dark Shaman

Far from town, temple, and market, those of ill intent meet in secret conclave to importune the forces of darkness for power and mastery. Behold here the dire raiment they don for this fell purpose.

The Dark Shaman costume will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from November 16 to November 22, 2023, at 10AM EST. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.


Xanmeer Doyen's Worship Robe

"Corset of kagouti-leather, full skirt of dank-cotton, beaded-shell vambraces and bird-skull pauldrons: everything a Xanmeer Doyen needs when welcoming worshipers into the Arboreal Reverie. The Hermit's outdone itself this time," says Jaxa-Kel.

The Xanmeer Doyen's Worship Robe will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from November 20 to November 27, 2023, at 10AM EST. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.


Armored Knights Pack

A costume pack that offers three variations of a fully armored battlefield knight.

The Armored Knights Pack will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from November 27 to November 30, 2023, at 10AM EST. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.


Crate

Dragonscale Crate

A mystery collection of Dragonscale related items!

Dragonscale Crate will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from November 9 to November 16, 2023, at 10AM EST.


Baandari Pedlar Crate

A mystery collection of Baandari Pedlar items!

Baandari Pedlar Crate will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from November 16 to November 22, 2023, at 10AM EST.


Events

Currency

Event Tickets

A ticket used to purchase rare goods from The Impresario, Event Merchant. Curious as to what goods? Well, chat with her to see what she has to offer!

Single Event Tickets will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time during the Gates of Oblivion Celebration. Stay tuned for event details!


Grace of the Green Bundle

As the forces of nature take root, so too do the blessings of Y'ffre. This bundle contains Y'ffre-Bound weapons, which are visibly graced by the God of Song and Forest. It also includes Drinweth, a Valenwood armorer who can advise you on martial matters.

The Grace of the Green Bundle will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time during the Gates of Oblivion Celebration.


Furniture

Statue, Vampiric Sovereign

The vile enchantments placed upon this statue make it a grim reminder of a vampire's power. Whether cloaked in bats, imbued with dark energies, or wreathed in flame, weak-hearted mortals will never forget the sight of it.

The Statue, Vampiric Sovereign will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from November 9 to November 22, 2023, at 10AM EST. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.


Furnishing Pack: Mad Alchemist

At last, you can demonstrate your true genius! Enhance your laboratory with these tanks and specimens then experiment to your heart's content! And, because the simple-minded may fear your work, keep your combat arts well-honed on a sturdy Bloodknight.

The Furnishing Pack: Mad Alchemist will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from November 9 to November 22, 2023, at 10AM EST. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.


Furnishing Pack: Daedric Ambitions

Build your own imposing edifices with these structural pieces and accessories. Will your enemies—and maybe even friends—quail at the results of your labors? Yes, yes, they will.

The Furnishing Pack: Daedric Ambitions will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from November 13 to November 20, 2023, at 10AM EST. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.


Statue, Prince of Ambition

Sweltering chaos accompanies this colossal statue of Mehrunes Dagon, the Prince of Destruction. Whether you prefer his smoldering heat, fiery gaze, blazing axe, or the full force of his inferno, this statue will bring sublime terror to any home.

The Statue, Prince of Ambition will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from November 16 to November 22, 2023, at 10AM EST. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.


Furnishing Pack: Chapel of Zenithar

Though Zenithar is known as the God of Work and Commerce, he also represents the peace and prosperity that comes with great effort. Now you can decorate your own place of worship to venerate this industrious Divine.

The Furnishing Pack: Chapel of Zenithar will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from November 22 to December 7, 2023, at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.


Music Box, Silver Rose

When activated, plays a music box arrangement of the devotional "Silver Rose" composition.

The Music Box, Silver Rose will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from November 22 to November 30, 2023, at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.


Houses

Bastion Sanguinaris

Towering architecture, views to die (or kill) for, and a secret passage number among the many features of this striking Blackreach edifice, which stands within easy reach of Greymoor Keep.

Bastion Sanguinaris will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from November 9 to November 22, 2023, at 10AM EST. Furnished and unfurnished versions will be available.


Kushalit Sanctuary

The recently abandoned Sheogorath shrine that locals call Assalkushalit features a statue to the Mad God within its stony hall. Whether you revere this Daedric Prince or want a home nestled in Red Mountain, this portal-ridden sanctuary can be yours!

Kushalit Sanctuary will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from November 13 to November 20, 2023, at 10AM EST. Furnished and unfurnished versions will be available.


Pantherfang Chapel

The embattled clergy of the Quenching Grail established Pantherfang Chapel in the First Era as a bastion of faith. Part cathedral, part citadel, this edifice still stands as an immortal reminder of Aedric strength. Allows use of the Pledge of Mara.

Pantherfang Chapel will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from November 22 to December 7, 2023, at 10AM EST. Furnished and unfurnished versions will be available.


Houseguests

Rigurt the Brash

The Nord diplomat Rigurt travels around Tamriel to learn about other cultures while demonstrating his own brand of Nord culture. Welcome him home! After adding Rigurt to your home, you can set him on a path, plus you and your visitors can speak with him.

Rigurt the Brash will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from November 9 to November 16, 2023, at 10AM EST. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.


Mounts

Umbral Striped Senche-raht

When this beautiful beast lost their rider while traversing a labyrinth, this banded Senche-raht left to seek mystical help to get back inside. Since their efforts often lead them into peril, Nushaben hopes to find a partner for the long journeys ahead.

The Umbral Striped Senche-raht mount will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from November 2, 2023, at 10AM EDT to November 9, 2023, at 10AM EST.


Autumn Messenger Fox

"As kits, these rambunctious little trouble-making furballs keep this one on her toes. But their predilection for trouble when young works in your favor—their ability to sense harm is nearly magical. Perfect for messenger work!"—Tesusah, Stablemaster

The Autumn Messenger Fox mount will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from November 16 to November 22, 2023, at 10AM EST.


Packlord Nightmare Wolf

Lord of the Nightmare Pack, this night-black Wolf mount has burning paws and flames hissing from its face and tail; can anyone doubt that its origin must be Mehrunes Dagon's plane of the Deadlands?

The Packlord Nightmare Wolf will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from November 20 to November 27, 2023, at 10AM EST. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.

Voideater Durzog

No one knows how these beasts found their way into Blackreach, but it didn't take long for them to heed the Dark Heart's call. Drenched in the void's corruption, this mount will chill your enemies to the bone.

The Voideater Durzog mount will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from November 22 to November 30, 2023, at 10AM EST.

Grand Nibenese Stallion

Though some claim these horses are bred purely for show, the Grand Nibenese Stallion serves as more than just a good luck charm in Leyawiin. They possess a keen intelligence and even temperament—maintaining their composure, even on crowded streets.

The Grand Nibenese Stallion mount will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from November 27 to December 4, 2023, at 10AM EST. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.

Pets

Sylvan Nixad

Once a common sight in Cyrodiil's Great Forest, the Sylvan Nixad is now most often encountered in the glades and meadows of the Gold Coast. Once tamed, they make charming companions, loyal and easy to care for.

The Sylvan Nixad pet will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from November 2, 2023, at 10AM EDT, to November 6, 2023, at 10AM EST. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.


Snowsnarl Durzog

Born with a snarl, these striped durzogs tend to bite the hand that feeds them—but only gently after they get to know you.

The Snowsnarl Durzog pet will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from November 2, 2023, at 10AM EDT to November 6, 2023, at 10AM EST. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.


Hallin's Jackal

After news of the Seventh Legion's presence near Hallin's Stand spread, several Evermore citizens moved quickly to protect some at-risk fauna, among them a breed of easily domesticated jackals. Now one of these fierce companions can roam at your side.

The Hallin's Jackal pet will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from November 6 to November 9, 2023, at 10AM EST. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.


Daedrat

This scurrying vermin from Oblivion would be lost in the vastness of Nirn without a loyal companion and guide. Even a Daedric rodent needs a friend.

The Daedrat pet will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from November 13 to November 16, 2023, at 10AM EST. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.


Mint Swamp Jelly

Though the Argonians claim that they name each breed of Black Marsh Swamp Jelly for its hue rather than its taste, there's no denying that the Mint Jelly does have a gratifyingly refreshing flavor.

The Mint Swamp Jelly pet will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from November 20 to November 27, 2023, at 10AM EST. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.


Deadlands Bantam Guar

It may look cute, but this volcanic little pest comes from Mehrunes Dagon's Oblivion plane of the Deadlands: it's got lava in its blood and fire in its eyes, so keep it away from the curtains.

The Deadlands Bantam Guar pet will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from November 20 to November 27, 2023, at 10AM EST. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.


Woodhearth Brown Rabbit

Some Wood Elf spinners claim Y'ffre granted these bunnies as part of the Green Pact, scholars contest that Second Empire Imperials brought them when establishing Woodhearth and, well, nature took its course. These hoppy hares make great fuzzy friends!

The Woodhearth Brown Rabbit pet will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from November 27 to November 30, 2023, at 10AM EST. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.

Polymorphs

Shadowsilk Goblin

Feel left out? Alienated? Alone? Adopt the form of a Shadowsilk Goblin, and you might* find that sense of belonging you crave among these creatures! Fleas not included, but easily attainable. *Might is no guarantee. They may try to eat you instead.

The Shadowsilk Goblin polymorph will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from November 13 to November 20, 2023, at 10AM EST. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.


Special Promotions

Rotating Sales

Take advantage of these weekly rotating offers!

In addition, we'll have additional discounts in the Crown Store every weekend in November. Check back in the Crown Store every Thursday for details on these sales!


Removal of Existing Crown Store Items

In addition, the following items will be retired from the Crown Store on all platforms on December 4 at 10am EST, so get them while you can!

Motifs

  • Crown Crafting Motif: Dreadsails
  • Crown Crafting Motif: Ascendant Order
  • Crown Crafting Motif: Syrabanic Marine
  • Crown Crafting Motif: Systres Guardian
  • Crown Crafting Motif: Y'ffre's Will
  • Crown Crafting Motif: Drowned Mariner


From weapons Daedric and divine to a humble hare, this month's Crown Store offerings have something for everyone. You can get the Crowns you'll need for these exciting new acquisitions through visiting the Buy Crowns page to stock up. Are you planning to use any of these items to impress the denizens of the Endless Archive with your fashion sense? Let us know how they react via X (formerly Twitter), Instagram, or Facebook!

item.title: Conquer Tamriel's Fears and Earn Special Rewards during the Witches Festival Event
item.description: Slay Tamriel's most horrific monstrosities to obtain unique in-game rewards during 2023's Witches Festival in-game event!
item.content:encoded:
Slay Tamriel's most horrific monstrosities to obtain unique in-game rewards during 2023's Witches Festival in-game event!

The Festival of Frights Returns!

This year's Witches Festival in-game event begins next Thursday, October 26 at 10AM EDT, and runs until Tuesday, November 7 at 10AM EST. During this spoopiest of occasions, you can claim terrifyingly awesome event-specific rewards including Plunder Skulls, XP gain boosts, Event Tickets, and more!

During the Witches Festival, all adventurers can enjoy a passive 100% boost to XP gain at all times. To collect the Witchmother's Whistle and down ladles of hag's brew, simply follow the steps listed below:

  • Open the Crown Store and acquire the free quest, “The Witchmother's Bargain.”
    • You can also pick up this quest by speaking with the Crow Caller, who you'll find outside of each Olyve's Brewery in Stonefalls, Glenumbra, or Auridon.
  • Complete the introductory quest to receive the Witchmother's Whistle tool.
    • You won't need to acquire the Witchmother's Whistle if you finished the quest in a previous year's event.
  • Blow the whistle to summon the “Witchmother's Cauldron,” which you drink from to polymorph yourself into a spooky scary skeleton.
    • You cannot summon the Cauldron in Cyrodiil.

Take a sip from the Witchmother's Cauldron

Acquire Cursed Rewards

During the Witches Festival event period, whenever you defeat a boss monster, you'll be offered a Plunder Skull container in addition to any regular rewards.

When you open a Plunder Skull, you have the chance to receive the following items:

  • Alchemy reagents
  • A festival-themed furnishing recipe
  • A festival-themed provisioning recipe
  • A complete festival-themed furnishing
  • A festival-themed treasure
  • A small chance for one of the following:
    • A Hollowjack style item
    • A Dremora style items
  • Worms, Crawlers, Guts, Insect Parts

What's more, whenever you fell a different unique type of boss for the first time each day, you'll be rewarded with a special Dremora Plunder Skull that contains some of the above items in addition to these:

  • Dremora motif chapter
  • A chance for one of the following items:
    • A Witches Festival Writ
    • A Glenmoril Teasure Map or Glenmoril armor outfit style page
    • A Grave Dancer weapon style page
    • NEW A Tome of Forbidden Appetites Memento Runebox
    • NEW A Witches Festival Ghost Netch pet fragment
    • NEW A tradeable style page for the Crowborne Hunter outfit style

The different types of bosses that offer these Dremora Plunder Skulls include arena bosses, incursion bosses (from Dark Anchors, Harrowstorms, Volcanic Vents, etc.), delve bosses, final dungeon bosses, Trial bosses, public dungeon bosses, and world bosses.

Reap a host of haunted rewards

Monsters of all shapes and sizes lurk throughout Tamriel this time of year, but there is one creepy beastie that is feared above all: The Crowborne Horror. To locate and slay this living nightmare, acquire the daily quest “Plucking the Crow” by speaking with the Witchmother Taerma, located inside of Olyve's Brewery and at every Impresario tent found throughout Tamriel.

For your courage, you'll be rewarded with a Dremora Plunder Skull that has a small chance to grant you an incredible offering of tradeable Witches Festival valuables instead of regular Dremora Plunder Skull items, including:

  • 10 Witch-Tamed Bear Dog fragments
  • The FULL style book for the Dremora motif
  • A folio of ALL Glenmoril Treasure Maps
  • Runebox: Tome of Forbidden Appetites
  • A random Crowborne Hunter outfit style page

Impresario & Event Tickets

During the Witches Festival, you can collect two Event Tickets from the first boss you defeat each day, earning up to 26 tickets by the end of the event. But don't forget: You can hold up to 12 Event Tickets only.

For this event, the Impresario will stock the following items:

  • All three Passion Dancer Blossom pet fragments:
    • Chartreuse Lily Petals
    • Enchanted Silver Flute
    • Mystical Sheet Music
  • The first fragment for Hoardhunter Ursauk mount:
    • Blessed Honeycomb
  • Crowborne Hunter outfit style pages
  • Witches Festival Ghost Netch pet fragment
  • Tome of Forbidden Appetites memento
  • Assorted Spooky Witches festival-themed Furnishings
    • Webs, Cone furnishing
    • Hollowjack Lantern, Ouroboros furnishing
    • Specimen Jar, Spare Brain furnishing
    • Ruby Candlefly Gathering furnishing
    • Vampiric Lamp, Azure Tall furnishing
    • Vampiric Lightpost, Azure Single furnishing
    • Vampiric Container, Yellow Liquid furnishing
  • Group Repair Kit
  • Companion Guild Commendations
  • Witches Grab Bag (This is purchasable only if you haven't yet collected all the items contained within)
    • Skeletal Marionette memento
    • Spectre Mask collectible
      • There are four variations of this collectible
    • Apple-Bobbing Cauldron fragment
    • Throw Bones Memento fragment
    • Marshmallow Toasty Treat emote
    • Witch's Bonfire Dust
    • Ghastly Visitation memento
    • Witch-Tamed Bear-Dog pet fragment
    • Witchmother's Servant outfit style pages

Of note: The Witches Festival will be your first opportunity to begin gathering the fragments for the final event morphing collectible of 2023, the Hoardhunter Ursauk mount!

Hoardhunter Ursauk morphing collectible

Additionally, the Impresario's colleague, Nenulaure the Indrik Vendor, has the following items available for purchase using Event Tickets:

  • Nascent Indrik Feathers
  • Pure Snow Indrik Berries
  • Crimson Indrik Berries
  • Frost-Light Indrik Pet
  • Rosethorn Indrik Pet

Lastly, the Impresario's Assistant is offering the following, which you can acquire with Event Tickets:

  • Unstable Morpholith fragments
    • Deadlands Flint
    • Rune-Etched Striker
    • Smoldering Bloodgrass Tinder
  • Dagonic Quasigriff fragments
    • Smoke-Wreathed Gryphon Feather
    • Black Iron Bit
    • Bridle Black Iron Stirrups

The spooky season has returned, and Nirn need heroes to help bring Tamriel's terrors under control. Will you come to their aid and enjoy the XP boosts, collectibles, and other rewards during the 2023 Witches Festival in-game event? Let us know via X (formerly Twitter), Instagram, and Facebook.

The Witches Festival in-game event begins Thursday, October 26 at 10AM EDT, and runs until Tuesday, November 7 at 10AM EST.

item.title: Crown Store Gifting Update – October 2023
item.content:encoded:
Following up on Studio Director Matt Firor's message last month about the current and future status of Crown Store Gifting, we are moving forward with re-enabling this functionality for eligible players at the account level. In this post, we will detail what to expect.

In September, we temporarily disabled Crown Store gifting due to a rapidly growing issue of "bad actors" using various fraudulent means to amass crowns without paying for them, then using them in turn to sell Crown Store items to players for real-world cash outside of the game client. That said, we recognize that gifting is a meaningful part of our community, and we are in the process of manually re-enabling Crown Store gifting access for select players who meet our specific criteria. This work will be complete tomorrow, October 11, during the maintenance window from 09:00 AM ET to 12:00 PM ET.

Gifting eligibility is determined by an evolving list of factors including but not limited to the account being at least 180 days past its first login and previous engagement with in-game features. You may check if you have access to gifting in-game via the Crown Store as well as via your billing history page in the ESO account center. If you have access to Crown Store gifting, you will see "Allow Crown Store Gifting" in your billing history. If you try to send a gift via the in-game Crown Store and do not have access, you will see a "Gifting Locked" pop-up message. Please note that we are exploring better ways to display this information in-game in the future, such as updating the Gifting Tutorial.

If you do not have access to Crown Store gifting after it is re-enabled on October 11, 2023, and wish for a review of your account, please visit https://help.elderscrollsonline.com and submit a Customer Support ticket. Please choose the Billing / Purchase / Code category then Platform > I have a question about a sale / offer > I want to send gift items from this account.

We appreciate everyone's understanding and patience while we get this solution up and running. Multiple teams have worked long hours to evaluate the best technical solutions that we could stand up in a reasonably short time, while also prioritizing the Crown Store gifting player experience. We are dedicated to continuing to explore ways to make this better and reduce fraudulent activity in ESO. Thanks again for being a part of our community and for your continued support.

item.title: Explore the Necrom Chapter & Unlock Bonus Rewards during the Secrets of the Telvanni In-Game Event
item.description: Team up with your fellow players within the Telvanni Peninsula and Apocrypha to unlock unique rewards for all Necrom owners.
item.content:encoded:
Team up with your fellow players within the Telvanni Peninsula and Apocrypha to unlock unique rewards for all Necrom owners.

Challenge complete!

Claim your unlocked rewards from the in-game Crown Store from now until Friday, October 20 at 10AM EDT. Don't forget, you need access to the Necrom Chapter to claim all Secrets of the Telvanni rewards—don't miss out!

Explore the Unknown

The Secrets of the Telvanni in-game event kicks off this Thursday, September 28 at 10AM EDT, and runs until Tuesday, October 10 at 10AM EDT. During the celebration event, you can earn bonus rewards and collectibles as you complete daily quests and adventure within the Telvanni Peninsula and Apocrypha zones.

Work together with your fellow players to complete the new event-unique daily quest, titled “Turn the Page” to progress the community meter found on the Secrets of the Telvanni event page. By the event's end, all Necrom Chapter owners can claim all unlocked rewards.

Complete a new daily quest

Every day, we'll update the meter on the event page with the #ESOFam's progress. The more of you who complete the quest each day, the quicker the meter will fill and unlock the rewards.

You can see the percentage goal for each of the three rewards below:

  • 33% Ebony Dwarven Scarab pet
  • 66% Nightmare Nest body and face markings
  • 100% Kelesan'ruhn house

Unlock these unique rewards (and more)

To get started, acquire the quest titled “The Telvanni Secret” free from the Crown Store or find Master Faras outside the city of Necrom. Don't forget, this event and its rewards are available only for those who own the Necrom Chapter.

In addition, when turning in the unique event daily quest, you must choose between Tralise and Yensa for one additional end-of-event reward:

  • Oath of the Keepers music box (from Tralise)
  • Apocryphal Tome furnishing (from Yensa)

Throughout the event, you can vote for which reward you'd like to unlock by choosing to either favor Tralise (to unlock the music box) or Yensa (to unlock the furnishing) when turning in the “Turn the Page” daily quest.

Only one of these two bonus rewards can be unlocked!

The sister with the most favor by the event's end will determine which bonus reward is unlocked. You can check which of the two sisters is currently favored during the event on the official page.

Update: Yensa is the most favored! You can claim the Apocryphal Tome furnishing from the in-game Crown Store from now until Friday, October 20 at 10AM EDT.

(Re)Discover Necrom

During the event period, as you adventure within the Telvanni Peninsula and Apocrypha, you receive event reward boxes, called Secret Telvanni Coffers, each time you complete a daily quest. In addition, you have a chance to receive a coffer when you complete the following activities in either of the two zones:

  • Defeat a Delve or World Boss
  • Defeat a Bastion Nymic Herald or Boss
  • Defeat any monster
  • Opening treasure chests, safeboxes, Psijic Portals, etc.
  • Harvesting resource nodes
  • Pickpocketing
  • …and more!

When you open a Secret Telvanni Coffer, you have a chance to receive the following items:

  • Random crafting materials
  • Valuables (that can be sold to vendors) or style items
  • Zone set items or Companion gear (only while either Azandar or Sharp are active)
  • Necrom furnishings, furnishing recipes, Treasure Maps, Survey Reports, or a motif page (Dead Keeper or Clan Dreamcarver)
  • A small chance for a tradeable style page of the NEW Apocrypha Expedition armor style

Take note, the first time you complete a Telvanni Peninsula or Apocrypha daily quest, you receive a Sublime Secret Telvanni Coffer instead of a standard one. Sublime coffers can contain the same items as regular ones, but also have a much greater chance of containing the rarer rewards (such as pages for the Apocrypha Expedition armor style).

Venture into the Necrom Chapter

Finally, in addition to the reward coffers, during the event period adventurers enjoy these additional bonuses when venturing into the Telvanni Peninsula and Apocrypha:

  • ALL zone daily quests and Trial weekly quests have their usual non-event reward boxes doubled.
  • Harvest node yields are increased.
  • World, Delve, and Trial Bosses all award double loot.

Impresario Event Goods

During the Secrets of the Telvanni event, you can earn two event tickets per day, awarded by completing any daily quest in either the Telvanni Peninsula or Apocrypha zones.

The Impresario stocks the following items during the event period:

  • All three Passion Dancer Blossom pet fragments:
    • Chartreuse Lily Petals
    • Enchanted Silver Flute
    • Mystical Sheet Music
  • All three Passion Dancer's Attire costume fragments:
    • Bolt of Indigo Cotton
    • Bolt of Silver Silk
    • Enchanted Sewing Kit
  • Bound style pages for the NEW Apocrypha Expedition style
  • Group Repair Kits
  • Companion Guild Commendations

The Passion Dancer's Attire costume

Also during the event, the Indrik Vendor Nenulaure stocks:

  • Nascent Indrik Feathers
  • Onyx Indrik Berries
  • Mossheart Indrik Berries
  • Ebon-Glow Indrik Pet
  • Sapling Indrik Pet

Finally, the Impresario's Assistant has the following items:

  • All three Unstable Morpholith pet fragments
    • Deadlands Flint
    • Rune-Etched Striker
    • Smoldering Bloodgrass Tinder
  • ll three Deadlands Firewalker personality fragments
    • Vial of Simmering Daedric Brew
    • Vial of Bubbling Daedric Brew
    • Vial of Scalding Daedric Brew

Wonderful Worlds Await

Venture into the Telvanni Peninsula and Apocrypha zones, complete daily quests, choose your favored sister, and unlock unique rewards for ALL Necrom Chapter players. Don't forget, the only way you can participate in this event and receive its unique rewards is to first own The Elder Scrolls Online: Necrom. Are you excited to delve into the weird and wonderful worlds of the Necrom Chapter? Let us know via Twitter, Instagram, or Facebook and don't forget to check the community's progress on the event's official page—good luck!

item.title: Crown Store Showcase—October 2023
item.description: Try not to scream (in excitement) at the collection of terrifying and terrific new items arriving in the Crown Store this October.
item.content:encoded:
Try not to scream (in excitement) at the collection of terrifying and terrific new items arriving in the Crown Store this October.

Check out the complete list of contents arriving in the Crown Store in October 2023 below. Don't forget you can always review everything on sale right now by heading over to the Crown Store page. Before that, be sure to open the Buy Crowns page to pick up however many crowns you need. Certain items and offers will be time-limited throughout the month, so be sure to read their individual details below and don't miss out.


ESO Plus Deals

All ESO Plus™ members have access to a monthly selection of exclusive deals and items. You can find more information about them in this article.

Exclusive Free Items

Painting: Sanity's Edge

"As you can see by my attached references, I am one of the foremost experts in vicinage wards, forfending spells, and the art of research. If anyone can deal with the Dreamstone's ire, it is me. I hope you come to the same conclusion."—Warlock Vanton

The Painting: Sanity's Edge will be available in the Crown Store FREE exclusively to ESO Plus Members on all platforms for a limited time, from October 12 at 10AM EDT to November 22, 2023, at 10AM EST.


Crown Gem and Seals of Endeavor Items

Mounts

Bonfire Wicker-Steed

Woe to any who ride this fiery steed without its consent! Sanctified by ashes from the funeral pyres of venerated witches, this wicker steed blazes a path across Tamriel and beyond, reminding any mortals who see it of their own short lifespans.

The Bonfire Wicker-Steed will be available for Crown Gems and Seals of Endeavor on all platforms for a limited time, from October 2 at 10AM EDT to November 6, 2023, at 10AM EST.


Customized Actions

Coldfire Recall

"The cold-flames speak to me. Will the flames speak to you, too, calling you to a master? Or perhaps you are a master—of bones? No matter. Go where your path leads, as I do. Perhaps we'll meet next in Coldharbour?"—Ymirra, Master of Bone and Scythe

The Coldfire Recall will be available for Crown Gems and Seals of Endeavor on all platforms for a limited time, from October 19, 2023, to November 2, 2023, at 10AM EDT.


Adornments

Hats

Jhunal's Owl Mask

Wise-Wing the Owl is associated in northern Tamriel with the god Jhunal or Julianos. During the Witches Festival she is said to warn the unwary away from graveyards and witches' covens where they may come to harm.

The Jhunal's Owl Mask will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from October 2 to October 5, 2023, at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.


Rajhin's Cat Mask

During the Witches Festival, no one perpetrates more cunning and devious tricks than Rajhin the Footpad, the Purring Liar. This mask enables you to adopt one of the many faces of that consummate trickster.

The Rajhin's Cat Mask will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from October 2 to October 5, 2023, at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.


Nightmare Daemon Mask Pack

This bundle includes the Nightmare Daemon Mask for Humans and Elves along with the variations for Khajiit and Argonians.

The Nightmare Daemon Mask Pack will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from October 16 to October 23, 2023, at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.


Daedric Death Mask

Daedra Worshiper, do you dare wear a mask that strikes fear into the souls of ordinary mortals? Then the Daedric Death Mask is for you! For as is graven upon its metal horn bands: FEAR ABIDES.

The Daedric Death Mask will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from October 23 to October 26, 2023, at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.


Flatbrim Mourning Hat Pack

Bundle including three Flatbrim Hats: the Modest Mourning Hat, Deluxe Mourning Hat, and Plumed Mourning Hat.

The Flatbrim Mourning Hat Pack will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from October 30 to November 2, 2023, at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.


Markings

Warrior-Poet Tattoos

This bundle includes the Warrior-Poet tattoo markings for both face and body. Vehk yourself!

The Warrior-Poet Tattoos will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from October 30 to November 2, 2023, at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.


Warrior-Poet Skull Tattoo

"Colorful and intimidating. Truly, these markings bring the fire of the warrior-poet to your spirit as well as to your face."—Artist-Adept Aimira

The Warrior-Poet Skull Tattoo will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from October 30 to November 2, 2023, at 10AM EDT.


Skull Face Tattoo Pack

Face marking bundle including the Verdant, Floral, and Spoked Skull Face Tattoos.

The Skull Face Tattoo Pack will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from October 30 to November 2, 2023, at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.


Skins

Decayed Zombie

Decayed Zombie: the skin condition no amount of Lillandril Moisturizing Lotion can cure! Pairs well with Worm Cult style armor.

The Decayed Zombie will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from October 12 to October 19, 2023, at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.


Crafting

Motifs

Crown Crafting Motifs: Grim Harlequin

As Chamberlain Haskill explains, "My Lord Sheogorath has directed me to compile a guide for those seeking to create 'Grim Harlequin' arms and armor, so that the Mad God's mortal servants may have a way to make all their equipment look the same. Of course, this standardization runs counter to all other cult practices, and is insane on the face of it. What's your point?" Motif book and style items that enable crafting in the Grim Harlequin style.

The Crown Crafting Motifs: Grim Harlequin will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms starting October 5 to October 12, 2023, at 10AM EDT.


Crown Crafting Motif: Kindred's Concord

High Priest Blightcrown writes of those using this style, “Many of you are entrusted with duties that require you to move without notice among the scoffers and persecutors of our world.” Use to learn the Kindred's Concord crafting style. Also has a chance to drop from daily coffers and bosses from Bastion Nymic.

The Crown Crafting Motif: Kindred's Concord will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms starting October 18, 2023, at 10AM EDT. The Kindred's Concord chapters, and very rarely the complete book, have a chance to drop from Bastion Nymic and Bastion Nymic Coffers, awarded from Ordinator Tandasea in Necrom.


Outfit Styles

Thurvokun Arms Pack

The long-dead Dragon Thurvokun once inhabited Fang Lair—but a Necromancer seeks to reawaken him! Stop this threat, then alter your weapon's appearance to match the Undaunted Thurvokun awards by using this complete set of Outfit styles.

The Thurvokun Arms Pack will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms starting October 2, 2023, to October 9, 2023, at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item. The matching mask page will have a small chance to drop from Thurvokun from veteran Fang Lair. The matching shoulder page can be purchased from Urgarlag Chief-bane for 50 Undaunted Keys, or has a chance of dropping from Urgarlag's Mystery Coffer for 1 Key. Having the achievement “Let Bygones Be Bygones” increases the drop chances of both items.


Elder Scrolls Artifact: Volendrung

Alter your two-handed weapon's Outfit style with a replica of the Volendrung Elder Scrolls Artifact, a paradoxical weapon forever torn between its Dwarven origins and Malacath's Daedric influence.

The Elder Scrolls Artifact: Volendrung will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms starting October 5, 2023, to October 9, 2023, at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.


Elder Scrolls Artifact: Ebony Blade

Alter your two-handed weapon's Outfit style with a replica of the Ebony Blade Elder Scrolls Artifact, a weapon forged by the Daedric Prince Mephala

The Elder Scrolls Artifact: Ebony Blade will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms starting October 9, 2023, to October 16, 2023, at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.


Evergloam Champion Armor Pack

Adherents of Nocturnal who venture to the Evergloam sometimes come back changed in more ways than one—the armor of that realm may hold greater appeal to the Daedric Prince of Shadow's followers than any mortal gear they initially wore. Alter your armor's appearance by using this complete set of Evergloam Champion Armor Outfit styles.

The Evergloam Champion Armor Pack will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms starting October 23, 2023, to October 30, 2023, at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.


Crowborne Hunter Arms Pack

Sergeant Qasim of Evermore notes, “The combination of fastidious detail work and exquisite balance on these weapons make them perfect for any seeking a more shiveringly totemic look as they hunt.” Alter your weapon's appearance by using this complete set of Crowborne Hunter Outfit styles.

The Crowborne Hunter Arms Pack will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms during the Witches Festival event. Matching armor pages will have a small chance to drop from Plunder Skulls. Bound versions of the armor pages can be purchased from the Impresario for 5 Event Tickets each during the event.


Wardrobe

Costumes

High Rock Pioneer Outfit

"Even a rugged pioneer of the borderlands can show some distinctive Breton style," says Lady Eloisse of House Manteau. "Our traditional linen shirt is suitable for any occasion!"

The High Rock Pioneer Outfit will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from October 2 to October 5, 2023, at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.


Jarl's Deluxe Moot Regalia

"Someday East and West Skyrim will be reunited and the Jarls will gather in a Moot to select a new High King," says Jork of Windhelm. "But that day may be a long time coming, so you might as well wear this noble outfit now!"

The Jarl's Deluxe Moot Regalia will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from October 16 to October 19, 2023, at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.


Cyrod Patrician Formal Gown

You'll look every inch the aristocrat in this formal wrap gown from Diocletia of Skingrad, paired with a splendid gorget of hammered gold dripping with Imperial diamonds. Get haughty!

The Cyrod Patrician Formal Gown will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from October 19 to October 26, 2023, at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.


Grisly Mummy Wrap

Only you know what lies beneath your enshrouding bandages. Whether hero or horror, your presence imparts an unforgettable chilling dread.

The Grisly Mummy Wrap costume will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from October 30 to November 2, 2023, at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.


Crate

Reaper's Harvest Crate

A mystery collection of Grim Reaper-related items!

Reaper's Harvest Crate will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from October 19 to November 2, 2023, at 10AM EDT.


Events

Currency

Event Tickets

A ticket used to purchase rare goods from The Impresario, Event Merchant. Curious as to what goods? Well, chat with her to see what she has to offer!

Single Event Tickets will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time during the Secrets of the Telvanni and the Witches Festival. Stay tuned for event details!


Furniture

Furnishing Pack: Sinister Hollowjack Items

Lanterns lure and pumpkins trip

Webs ensnare and grave hands grip

Crows will mock as wraith-scythes hack

All in thrall to Hollowjack!

The Furnishing Pack: Sinister Hollowjack Items will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from October 2 at 10AM EDT to November 6, 2023, at 10AM EST. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.


Furnishing Pack: Necrom Garden

When you need a break from the rigors of research or strenuous adventures, enjoy a quiet Necrom-themed nook in your home. Including a gazebo, statuary, fungi, and more, this pack may inspire your inner mycoturge into a great feat of gardening.

The Furnishing Pack: Necrom Garden will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from October 6 to October 20, 2023, at 10AM EDT.


Statue, The Thirty-Fourth Sermon

"When GULGA MOR JIL saw his mother-father, he asked why he should have to die and return to oblivion. Vivec told the eighth monster that to be otherwise was to betray his nature."—The Thirty-Six Lessons of Vivec, Sermon Thirty-Four

The Statue, The Thirty-Fourth Sermon will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from October 6 to October 20, 2023, at 10AM EDT.


Target Harrowing Reaper, Trial

This is a large house item. This may be attacked and, when destroyed, will regenerate. This creature is equivalent to a veteran trial boss. Its abilities include granting a resource-restoring synergy opportunity, performance buffs, and self debuffs.

The Target Harrowing Reaper, Trial will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from October 6 to October 20, 2023, at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.


Music Box, The Shadows Stir

When activated, plays a music box arrangement of the haunting "The Shadows Stir" composition.

The Music Box, The Shadows Stir will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from October 12 to October 19, 2023, at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.


Music Box, Witchmother's Bubbling Brew

"Pulp of pumpkin, dash of guts. Prep your cauldron, make your cuts. Capture death 'cause it's your due. Stir it all and then you're through." When activated, plays a music box arrangement of the macabre "Witchmother's Bubbling Brew" composition.

The Music Box, Witchmother's Bubbling Brew will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms during the Witches Festival event.


Furnishing Pack: Trappings of Mephala Worship

With these furnishings, some from Mephala cultists, some that replicate the bizarre environment of the Spiral Skein, you can adopt the ambience of the realm of the Webspinner.

The Furnishing Pack: Trappings of Mephala Worship will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from October 26 at 10AM EDT to November 9, 2023, at 10AM EST. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.


Furnishing Pack: Witches' Coven

Bring the moody atmosphere of Hag Fen to your home with these tools and trappings of the witch's trade. Whether brewing potent poisons or cooking cauldrons of questionable stew, craft in true coven style with the included alchemy and provisioning stations!

The Furnishing Pack: Witches' Coven will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms during the Witches Festival event. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.


Houses

Wraithhome

With its pillars of skulls, stained glass, and ghostly portals, this abode can accommodate even the most tormented soul. Take advantage of its open layout to set up large-scale rituals, and use its vaults and lofty balconies for vile experiments.

Wraithhome will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from October 12 to October 26, 2023, at 10AM EDT. Furnished and unfurnished versions will be available.


Shadow Queen's Labyrinth

A winding maze dominates the grounds of this twilight-enshrouded estate, creating endless opportunities to perplex visitors. The visceral awe evoked by Nocturnal's Evergloam skies provides an exquisite contrast to the spacious, Summerset-inspired home.

Shadow Queen's Labyrinth will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from October 26 at 10AM EDT to November 9, 2023, at 10AM EST. Furnished and unfurnished versions will be available.


Exorcised Coven Cottage

Pay no attention to the rumors: this witches hut on the edge of Hag Fen in Glenumbra is guaranteed NOT to be haunted by the dead, the undead, or restless spirits of any kind. It does come with tumbledown walls to keep the crocodiles and wolves out. Spooky!

Exorcised Coven Cottage will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms during the Witches Festival event. Furnished and unfurnished versions will be available.


Houseguests

Heiruna

Oh, the ignominy of being an agent of justice trapped inside a small floating doll! Now Heiruna intends to plot vengeance—in your retreat. After adding Heiruna to your home, you can set her on a path, plus you and your visitors can speak with her.

Heiruna will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from October 12 to October 26, 2023, at 10AM EDT.


Squire Caw

Is your home bedecked in shiny treasures? Did you leave carrion out in the sun? Regardless, Blackfeather Court's most nettlesome squire noticed! After adding Squire Caw to your home, you can set him on a path, plus you and your visitors can speak with him.

Squire Caw will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from October 26 at 10AM EDT to November 9, 2023, at 10AM EST. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.


Mounts

Great Dark Ram

"The mythic texts of discredited scholars are right, the Great Dark Ram lives! Hircine appears in this form only during Rain's Hand in the Great Forest. Soon, there will be the trials of virility. I hope my strength endures."—Lost Journal of Bekelva

The Great Dark Ram mount will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from October 5 to October 16, 2023, at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.


Zombie Horse

Mannimarco's Order of the Black Worm must be responsible for the re-animated Zombie Horse, as it was first seen in Cyrodiil as a Worm Anchorite's mount.

The Zombie Horse mount will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from October 12 to October 19, 2023, at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.


Hollowjack Indrik

"Twisted twigs, a scent of death, a dance amid the briars. A dash of howls and drip of gore starts sinister fires. Stir round with haunted bone, then call me with your screams. If I approve, a mount you gain to torment your foes' dreams."—Lord Hollowjack

The Hollowjack Indrik mount will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from October 26 to November 2, 2023, at 10AM EDT.

Pets

Black Cat

This black cat knows things you cannot know, and sees things you cannot see. But that is the nature of all black cats, is it not?

The Black Cat pet will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from October 2 to October 9, 2023, at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.


Dire Pony

When you always wanted a pony as a child and your parents wouldn't let you have one so you grew up bitter and tormented and became a dark cultist but now you can finally afford a pony.

The Dire Pony pet will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from October 5 to October 16, 2023, at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.


Amber Ash Hopper

Native to the upper Ashlands and the slopes of Red Mountain, the perky Amber Ash Hopper is a favorite pet of Dunmer expatriates, as it's relatively low maintenance (it digs its own hole in the ground), and it reminds the Dark Elves of home.

The Amber Ash Hopper pet will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from October 16 to October 23, 2023, at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.


Skeletal Senche-Leopard

Is Necromancy always wrong? Not even death can stop this loyal senche-leopard from stalking to adventure at your side!

The Skeletal Senche-Leopard pet will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from October 19 to October 23, 2023, at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.


Skeletal Pack Wolf

When the Two Moons are full, the undead wolf pack rises from the grave, point their canine craniums at the sky, and try to howl—but the only sound is a dismal rattling in their bony throats.

The Skeletal Pack Wolf pet will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from October 19 to October 23, 2023, at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.


Rihad Coffee Scorpion

The Coffee Scorpion gets its name from the way they like their kaveh in Rihad: strong, dark, and sweet. (Well, I guess two out of three isn't bad.)

The Rihad Coffee Scorpion pet will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from October 23 to October 26, 2023, at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.



Witch's Infernal Familiar

Equipped with a hat, this black cat makes its way in the world at your side, leaving little fiery pawprints behind as it goes.

The Witch's Infernal Familiar pet will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from October 23 to October 30, 2023, at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.


Volkihar Death Hound

“Rarely do these inky black death hounds venture beyond Castle Volkihar—most serve their master's purpose at home better than abroad. The ones wandering after folk are probably some form of spy for the Volkihar vampires.”—Nalana, Advisor to House Tamrith

The Volkihar Death Hound pet will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from October 30 to November 2, 2023, at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.


Personalities

Zombie

Graargh URR agg rhhh HAAAGH gug gug gug. RrrrrRRrrrrawww! GHORF blafffft urgl! Sneg?

The Zombie personality will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from October 12 to October 19, 2023, at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.

Polymorphs

Werewolf Lord

Wear Hircine's Gift with pride as the leader of the lycanthrope pack with the Werewolf Lord polymorph. Time to howl!

The Werewolf Lord polymorph will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from October 5 to October 12, 2023, at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.


Pumpkin Spectre

A Pumpkin Spectre is like a horrific figure from a skooma-induced nightmare! And with this costume, the wearer can take on the semblance of these dread monsters.

The Pumpkin Spectre polymorph will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from October 23 to October 30, 2023, at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.


Haunted homesteads, accursed arms, and terrifying beasts both big and small await you in the Crown Store this month. Don't forget, before you can acquire any of these creepy collectibles, you'll need to visit the Buy Crowns page to stock up on crowns. Are you planning to spook friends and foes alike with any of the above items this October? Let us know via Twitter, Instagram, and Facebook.
